home.sub: Try out some of the most popular question banks in Gamedle.io!

about.title: About me
about.line1: Hello, my name is Luong Khoa, the person who created this website!
about.line2: First of all, I hope this website can make you happy, if anything makes you feel uncomfortable, I hope you can ignore it.
about.line3: I only made this website alone so there may be a lot of errors.
about.line4: Please let me know if there are any errors on Discord! You can meet new friends there too :D

privacy.content:
By using this website you agree to game data being saved.

Game data is used to enhance your game experience!

Ad stuff

Third party vendors,including Google and other ad networks, use cookies to serve ads based on a user's prior visits to your website or other websites.

Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads to your users based on their visit to your sites and/or other sites on the Internet. Users may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Ads Settings.

header.content: I hope you enjoy this daily puzzle game! If it makes your day brighter then the best way you can support us is by sharing the site with your friends, posting your daily numbers on reddit, discord or your favorite site or sharing Share Gamedle with your favorite news outlet!
